insert.if: INSERT INTO ABS_MANAGE (code, emp_code, annual, attendance, writer, writer_day) VALUES (#{workAttCode}, #{userCode}, DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d'), now(), #{userId}, now())

INSERT INTO ABS_MANAGE (code, emp_code, annual, attendance, leavework, writer, writer_day, manage_modi_check, manage_name, manage_date, reason) VALUES (#{workAttCode}, #{userCode}, #{day}, #{startWorkTime}, #{endWorkTime}, #{userId}, now(), 'Y', #{adminId}, now(), #{coment})

mapper.update: UPDATE ABS_MANAGE A INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ABS_MANAGE WHERE emp_code = #{userCode} AND annual = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d')) B ON A.code = B.code SET A.leavework = NOW();
mapper.select:
SELECT A.*, C.dename, D.poname, B.emp_name FROM ABS_MANAGE A
LEFT JOIN EMP_MANAGE B ON A.emp_code = B.code
LEFT JOIN DEMG C ON B.demgcode = C.code
LEFT JOIN POSISYS D ON B.pocode = D.code;
